summary.span: 提供高性能的 API，以便提供 UTF-8 编码 JSON 文本的只进和非缓存编写权限。

span.span: Provides a high-performance API for forward-only, non-cached writing of UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Utf8JsonWriter` 在不缓存的情况下按顺序写入文本，并且默认情况下将遵循[JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259)，但写入注释除外。`Utf8JsonWriter` writes the text sequentially with no caching and by default adheres to the [JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259), with the exception of writing comments. 当启用验证时，尝试编写无效 JSON 的方法会引发 ，其中包含上下文特定的错误消息。A method that attempts to write invalid JSON when validation is enabled throws an with a context-specific error message. 若要能够使用缩进和空格设置输出的格式、跳过验证或自定义转义行为，请创建 的实例并将其传递给编写器。To be able to format the output with indentation and white space, to skip validation, OR to customize the escaping behavior, create an instance of and pass it in to the writer. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-utf8jsonwriter)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md#use-utf8jsonwriter).
